properties.name: sink
properties.description: Name of the queue of topic to listen to

properties.name: clientname
properties.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues

properties.name: subscription
properties.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues

options.name: containerId
options.description: Will be used to pass to the RHEA Backend as container_id

options.name: jsonConvertByteArrayToString
options.description: Whether to convert JSON Body content (["body"]["content"]) from Byte Array to string. Needed for Azure Service Bus.

options.name: jsonParseBody
options.description: Whether to parse the body to an object

options.name: pullMessagesNumber
options.description: Number of messages to pull from the bus for every cicle

options.name: onlyBody
options.description: Whether to return only the body property

options.name: parallelProcessing
options.description: Whether to process messages in parallel

options.name: reconnect
options.description: Whether to automatically reconnect if disconnected

options.name: sleepTime
options.description: Milliseconds to sleep after every cicle
